haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Ltn Patrik Schorner, Ltn Patrik Schorner

 The mission was flown from Bellevue Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 10/02/1916 near Vienne-le-Chateau.
A F.E.2b of Esc 45 was brought down by Benjamin Singermann of FA 293b.
S/Lt Emilien Lacombrade was killed in action.
S/Lt Aime Ignace was killed in action.
Benjamin Singermann was  flying a DFW C.V.
narrative: There are crazy missions.  Fly at low altitude with everybody shooting at you until you find your troops.  I fly low along the front until I see the flare indicating our troops.  I would like to stay and strafe but I am set upon by an English pusher and must defend myself.
